#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define PII pair<int , int >
#define m_p make_pair
#define p_b push_back
#define all(v) (v).begin(), (v).end()

#define MAX 1000006
#define MOD 1000000007

#define ff first
#define ss second
#define LL long long

LL n,m,k,p,q,l,r;
LL ans;
string str;

LL dp[1<<16][16];

LL recurr(int mask , int last)
{
    if(mask==((1<<n)-1)) return 1;
    if(dp[mask][last]!=-1) return dp[mask][last];
    LL ans=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
        if(mask & (1<<(i-1))) continue;
        if(last==0 || abs(i-last)<=k)
            ans+= recurr(mask|(1<<(i-1)) ,i);
            
    }
    dp[mask][last]=ans;
    return ans;
}

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
    //freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--){

        cin>>n>>k;
        memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
        ans=0;
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
            ans+=recurr(1<<(i-1) ,i);
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;

    }


    //printf("%lf",ans);
//    cout.precision(15);
//    cout<<fixed<<sum;

    return 0;
}
